Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The in vivo protection was associated to the prevention of oxidative stress and preservation of mitochondrial oxygen consumption and activity of respiratory complex I , and the in vitro protection was associated to the prevention of ROS production .

Let's think step by step.

Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here are the "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| Oxidative stress |
| Mitochondrial oxygen consumption |
| Respiratory complex I |
| ROS production |

Please note that these are the exact words used in the paragraph to refer to these entities.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| Oxidative stress |
| Mitochondrial oxygen consumption |
| Respiratory complex I |

I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease":

* "preservation" (not a disease)
* "ROS production" (not a disease, but a process related to disease)
